blogs.title: Being Stabbed with a Mucus Dagger Is Not Even the Worst Part of Snail Sex
blogs.summary:
If snails used Facebook, all their relationship statuses would say "It's complicated." It's also slimy, violent, and life-shortening.

Most species of snail that live on land are hermaphroditic—that is, they have a complete set of female and mal
